org.pircbotx.hooks
Interface Topic.SimpleListener

All Superinterfaces:
BaseSimpleListener, Listener
All Known Subinterfaces:
MetaSimpleListenerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
MetaSimpleListener, SimplePircBotX
Enclosing class:
Topic
public static interface Topic.SimpleListener
extends BaseSimpleListener

Simple listener that takes event parameters as parameters. See Topic for an explanation on use

See Also:
Topic

Method Summary
 void onTopic(Channel channel, String source, User setBy, boolean changed)
          Simple Listener for Topic Events.
 

Method Detail

onTopic

void onTopic(Channel channel,
             String source,
             User setBy,
             boolean changed)
Simple Listener for Topic Events. See Topic for a complete description on when this is called.

Parameters:
channel - The channel that the topic belongs to.
topic - The topic for the channel.
source - The user that set the topic.
date - When the topic was set (milliseconds since the epoch).
changed - True if the topic has just been changed, false if the topic was already there.
See Also:
Topic, Topic.SimpleListener
